item.title: Fixing Flyspell for Emacs in Mac OS X
item.description: I use the flyspell-modeas a spell checking mechanism in emacs. Recently, I moved to Mac OS X, and I began to get this error whenever I started emacs: Error enabling Flyspell mode: (Searching for program No such file or directory aspell) I had installed aspell with Homebrew. The issue seemed to be that Emacs was unable to find the aspell binary. Homebrew installs binaries in /usr/local/bin and it was in my $PATH.
